AllowManagedFileProvidersToRequestAttrib.title: Allow Managed File Providers to Request Attribution
AllowManagedFileProvidersToRequestAttrib.description: If true, enables file providers access to the path of the requesting process. Available in macOS 11.0 and Later

ManagementAllowsKnownFolderSyncing.title: Management Allows Known Folder Syncing
ManagementAllowsKnownFolderSyncing.description:
If 'false', the device prevents the File Provider extension using desktop
    and documents synchronization in any app. If 'true', the device allows File Provider
    extension desktop and documents synchronization. This does not impact the ability
    for apps to utilize the File Provider extension for file and folder syncing with
    remote storage. Available in macOS 15.2 and Later

items.title: AllowListItem
items.description: A composed app identifier. The format is Bundle.Identifier (TeamIdentifier).
